name: Save the Baby (Nicompany)
description:
Deliver three babies, saving them from evil clouds, thick smoke and popping balloons!

After 50 enemies, a house appears where you have to deliver the baby!

W - go up | S - go down

Each enemy has unique damage to the player:

The cloud turns into a thunderous, dark cloud, which strikes the stork with lightning.

Getting into the smoke, the stork becomes black, smeared with soot.

The balls explode when they collide with the player + have different colors.

ALL GRAPHIC WAS MADE BY NICOMPANY
